title: This Sam Adams beer is so strong that it’s illegal in 15 states
author: Katelyn Umholtz
bullets: Food News This year's edition of Utopias is brewed at a 30% ABV, which is considered a "milestone" for this potent brew.
Sam Adams brewed a 30% ABV beer, and it's illegal to buy in some states.
Courtesy of Sam Adams Sam Adams just made a beer so strong, you may not even be able to legally drink it in some states.

title: Jaylen Brown wants NBA to give players more support amid gambling scandal, reacts to Terry Rozier arrest
author: Conor Roche
bullets: Boston Celtics "I'm not sure what the answer is, but definitely something that people have to spend more time having conversations about.
" Jaylen Brown was teammates with Terry Rozier for three seasons.

Danielle Parhizkaran/Globe Staff By Conor Roche October 24, 2025 | 4:43 PM 3 minutes to read Jaylen Brown admitted that he isn’t fully up to date on the details in the illegal gambling scandal that led to the arrests of three NBA figures, but he isn’t a fan of the betting culture that’s made its way into sports.

title: Massachusetts bill takes aim at grocery store self-checkouts
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Local News The proposal would cap the number of machines and require stores to open more staffed lanes.
Self-checkout lanes at the Brookline Stop & Shop.

title: Mike Vrabel calls out Rhamondre Stevenson for how he ran into end zone on touchdown run vs. Titans
author: Conor Roche
bullets: New England Patriots "We can’t sit there and be careless with the football.
" Rhamondre Stevenson ran for a four-yard touchdown in the Patriots' win over the Titans in Week 7, but Mike Vrabel didn't like how he ran into the end zone.

Danielle Parhizkaran/Globe Staff By Conor Roche October 24, 2025 | 3:48 PM 2 minutes to read Mike Vrabel stuck by Rhamondre Stevenson’s side through the running back’s fumble issues early in the 2025 season.

title: At Boston Book Festival, Julia Quinn teases ‘Bridgerton’ Season 4
author: Annie Jonas
bullets: Books The bestselling author of Bridgerton opened the Boston Book Festival with insights on the Netflix adaptation, representation in romance, and what’s next for the series.
"Bridgerton" author Julia Quinn (left) and Andrea Martucci (right), host of the “Shelf Love” podcast, kicked off the 2025 Boston Book Festival with a romance keynote discussion on Oct.

title: Woman dies after being rescued from island off Cape Cod following boat fire
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Local News Cynthia Sullivan, her son, and her husband escaped to Naushon Island after their boat went up in flames this week.
Cynthia and Patrick Sullivan.
GoFundMe A woman who escaped a burning boat and was rescued from an island off Cape Cod this week has died.

title: Patriots owner Robert Kraft nominated for induction into Pro Football Hall of Fame
author: Conor Roche
bullets: New England Patriots Kraft is one of seven members from the Patriots' dynasty era to be nominated for induction into the Pro Football Hall of Fame this week.
Robert Kraft has helped the Patriots win six Super Bowl titles after buying the team in 1994.

(AP Photo/Maria Lysaker, File) By Conor Roche October 24, 2025 | 1:37 PM 2 minutes to read There’s a chance Bill Belichick and Robert Kraft could be inducted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame together next summer.
